      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      DecksHandler()
      Constructor: creates a new DecksHandler from the jsons of weapons, ammo tiles and powerups

      Modifier and Type Method Description

    • Constructor Detail

      • DecksHandler

        public DecksHandler()
        Constructor: creates a new DecksHandler from the jsons of weapons, ammo tiles and powerups

    • Method Detail

      • drawWeapon

        public Weapon drawWeapon()
        Method that draws a weapon from the weapons deck. For a better fairness, it shuffles the deck before every drawn
        Returns:
        the weapon drawn
        Throws:
        java.lang.RuntimeException - if the deck is empty

      • drawAmmoTile

        public AmmoTile drawAmmoTile()
        Method that draws an ammo tile from the ammo tiles deck. For a better fairness, it shuffles the deck before every drawn if the deck finishes after the drawn, it gets refilled from the cards in the recycle bin
        Returns:
        the ammo tile drawn

      • drawPowerup

        public Powerup drawPowerup()
        Method that draws a powerup from the powerups deck. For a better fairness, it shuffles the deck before every drawn if the deck finishes after the drawn, it gets refilled from the cards in the recycle bin
        Returns:
        the powerup drawn

      • wasteAmmoTile

        public void wasteAmmoTile​(AmmoTile ammoTile)
        Method that adds the used ammo tiles to the ammo tiles recycle bin
        Parameters:
        ammoTile - it's the ammo tile to add to the bin
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if ammoTile is null

      • wastePowerup

        public void wastePowerup​(Powerup powerup)
        Method that adds the used or wasted powerups to the powerups recycle bin
        Parameters:
        powerup - it's the powerup to add to the bin
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if powerup is null
